template.name: propa
template.description: array property, for single values ues prop

template.name: propro
prop

variable.name: NO_VALUE
variable.expression: enum(concat(" or ", INITIAL_VALUE ," for no value."), ".")

variable.name: GETTER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("Accessor method to get the ", PROPERTY_NAME," value.")

variable.name: GETTER_RETURN_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: enum(concat(VALID_VALUES, NO_VALUE), concat("The current value of ", PROPERTY_NAME,NO_VALUE))

variable.name: SETTER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("Fluent accessor method to set the ", PROPERTY_NAME," value.")

variable.name: SETTER_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: enum(concat(VALID_VALUES, NO_VALUE), concat("A value to be converted to ", TYPE_NAME," type", NO_VALUE))

template.name: zparse
selectDtoBy1Parameter
template.description: Builds a JVZoo selectXyzDto method that takes one query filter

template.name: insertOrUpdateDtoWithAutoIdColumn
template.description: Builds a JVZoo insertOrUpdateXyzDto method where the table has an auto incrementing id column

template.name: storeDto
template.description: Builds a JVZoo insertOrUpdateXyzDto method that takes one query filter

template.name: getDtoBy1Parameter
template.description: Builds a JVZoo getXyzDtoBy method that takes one filter parameter

template.name: selectDtoBy2Parameters
template.description: Builds a JVZoo selectXyzDto method that takes two query filters
